column2: Need a Smart option for your next hotel stay? We have one for you! Book a hotel on SmartBuy with your HDFC Bank Debit & Credit Cards and enjoy Rs 1000 off*. Use code: STAYHDFC T&C apply. To know more visit: bit.ly/HDFC_SBHotels
